channel.title: Aliens Vs. Predator
channel.description: So... that game looks really cool. I'm a big fan of AvP 2 for PC, and I enjoyed playing the demo on Steam. Has anyone else tried it out?

item.title: Aliens Vs. Predator
item.dc:creator: IsolatedPurity
item.description:
I like it, don’t like the “auto lock” feature it has though. Always been a fan of the AvP games, I probably wont touch the multiplayer that much but the SP looks like sex.

I really liked the demo, although I’m having quite a few connection issues.
